mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user ( username, id_card,phone, email,avatar,password, salt,authority, created_user,created_time, modified_user,modified_time )VALUES( #{username}, #{idCard},#{phone}, #{email},#{avatar}, #{password}, #{salt},#{authority},#{createdUser}, #{createdTime},#{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT uid, username, password, avatar, salt FROM t_user WHERE username=#{username}
SELECT uid, username, password, avatar, salt FROM t_user WHERE phone=#{phone}
